search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Kit (kit.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Kit is: [https://kit.com/pricing](https://kit.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Flexible Pricing Plans for Every Stage of Your Creator Business

extracted_content.content:
Your next breakthrough happens in person: Craft + Commerce, June 11-14 in Boise. [View speakers](https://kit.com/conference)

Scalable plans for your growing business

##### How many email subscribers do you have?

0

1,000

500K+

Recommended

#### Creator

Automate your work

$25/mo

$290 billed yearly _(Save $58 per year)_

* * *

*   **Everything in Newsletter plan, plus:**

14-day free trial. No card required. Cancel anytime.

Compare plans and features
--------------------------

##### Newsletter

$0per month/moNo cost. No catch.

##### Creator

$25per month/mo$290 billed yearly

##### Creator Pro

$50per month/mo$590 billed yearly

##### Grow your audience

Subscribers

The total number of subscribers you can manage in your account. Subscribers are only counted if they are unique and active.

Up to 10,000

Create landing pages

No website? No problem. Create focused landing pages to capture emails, test ideas, or promote specific offers.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Create email opt-in forms

Create unlimited email opt-in forms you can embed to your website as a modal, sticky bar, slide in, or inline embed.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Create a newsletter feed & website

Create a mini website with your Creator Profile to host all your newsletter content, links, products, and more.

Landing page and form templates

Whether you're creating a landing page or a form, we have a library of beautiful customizable templates to help you get started.

Customizable domain

Customize your free Kit domain or connect your own custom domain so all your landing pages are branded.

Unlimited traffic

We’re here to help you grow your audience. So share your ideas with the world. Our servers can handle it.

Deliver opt-in incentives

Offer a freebie digital file to your audience that will be delivered automatically when they sign up.

List growth reporting

Detailed analytics of your audience growth. See what forms or pages people are signing up for, and track unsubscribes too.

Creator Network

Access to a network of creators using Kit to increase your discoverability and grow your email list through organic recommendations.

Free Recommendations

Cross-promote with other creators to grow your list through organic recommendations.

Smart Recommendations

Automatically grow your subscriber list by being recommended to audiences from similar creators.

\-

Facebook custom audiences

Dynamically sync subscribers in Kit to your Facebook custom audiences for stronger ad targeting.

\-

\-

Newsletter referral system

Get a free SparkLoop plan (worth $99/mo) to build a reward referral program to drive newsletter growth.

\-

\-

##### Subscriber management

Subscriber tagging

Tag subscribers by entry point, interest, actions, and any other way you want to organize subscribers on your email list.

Subscriber segmentation

Segment subscribers by grouping tags in the same category to personalize your communications.

Unsubscribe page builder

Create topics of interests and customize your unsubscribe page to reduce subscriber churn.

Users

The total number of users you can have on your account. Perfect for adding your team, with their own login, to support your marketing efforts.

1

2

Unlimited

Subscriber engagement scoring

Get your subscribers automatically scored based on engagement level and incorporate it into your subscriber segmentation.

\-

\-

##### Send email campaigns

Send email broadcasts

Send or schedule one-time email campaigns or newsletters to your list.

Email template library

Use our email templates as a starting point to easily customize your email so it fits your brand and content.

Image library

Access to your own image library with photos you use often, Unsplash, and your own Instagram photos.

Create custom email templates

Create your very own custom email templates with HTML/CSS.

A/B split testing

A/B test your email subject lines to see how you can improve your email open rates.

Conditional email content

Use Liquid to deeply personalize your content, showing different relevant content to different subscribers based on their tags.

Resend unopened campaigns

One-click to resend email campaigns to subscribers who have not yet opened the email to boost open rate and engagement.

Remove Kit branding

Toggle off the Kit branding on landing pages, emails, and product pages.

\-

Edit links in sent broadcasts

Fix any link errors even after you've sent your email.

\-

\-

Deliverability reporting

See how your open and click rates trend over time across your whole list, or for a particular provider or segment.

\-

\-

Insights dashboard

Get actionable insights about your marketing and sales performance to drive more revenue for your business.

\-

\-

##### Automate your work

Content snippets

Have content you reuse over and over in emails? Create content snippets you can automatically insert and save time.

Visual automation template library

Pre-built automation email funnels to help you save time and get started with automating your marketing.

\-

Unlimited

Unlimited

Visual automation builder

Build email funnels based on user behaviors to automatically manage subscribers and trigger emails with split paths and more.

Unlimited

Unlimited

API documentation

Get access to Kit's API to build your own integration to organize your email subscribers and connect with them.

Automated email sequences

Create and send a series of emails automatically, like a series of welcome emails or a series of your best content.

1

\-

100+ direct apps

Integrate your favorite tools to reduce complexity, manual tasks, and extend the functionality of Kit through the Kit App Store

\-

##### Monetize your content

Sell digital products

Create customizable sales page and easy checkout flow to help you sell more products with a full suite of pricing methods.

Run paid newsletters

Charge subscribers access to a paid newsletter—monthly, quarterly, or annually. Plus, you can have public newsletter page with gated posts to convert more subscribers.

Sell recurring subscriptions

Charge for a recurring membership for coaching packages, sponsorships, community access, and more.

Set up virtual tip jars

Give your audience an easy way to say thanks. Accept support from your super fans, and get tips and donations for your work.

Low transaction fees

For any digital products or subscription—inclusive of credit card processing fees, so Kit only takes 0.6% of the total fees.

3.5% + 30c

3.5% + 30c

3.5% + 30c

Paid Recommendations

Get paid to promote other creators or newsletters in your recommendations.

\-

Paid Recommendations fees

Kit’s fee for any earnings paid through Paid Recommendations.

\-

23.5%

23.5%

##### Support

Creator University

Our in-house creator education team creates courses to support you in growing your audience and income. Your success is our success.

Product support

We offer different ranges of product support to make sure we help get your questions answered as quickly as possible.

24/7 support

24/7 support

24/7 priority support

Free migration from another platform

Looking to switch over to Kit from another platform? We have an in-house team to rebuild your forms, templates, and automations.

\-

##### Newsletter

$0per month/moNo cost. No catch.

##### Creator

$25per month/mo$290 billed yearly

##### Creator Pro

$50per month/mo$590 billed yearly

FAQs
----

Answers to frequently asked questions.

Is Kit built for people like me?

Kit is for creators who mean business.

Success in our world isn’t easily achieved, and Kit creators know what success really takes—serious passion, commitment, and purpose. They know that being a successful creator is more than just building a profitable business; it’s also about building a valuable one, too.

No matter what you create, sell, or build, if this resonates with you, then Kit is home to you.

Let’s build a profitable and valuable business together.

Which plan should I choose?

We have something for you no matter what you’re focusing on in your creator business:

Our Newsletter Plan is perfect if you’re focused on building your audience. It gives you essential tools to build and engage an audience of up to 10,000 subscribers, for free.

Our Creator Plan is perfect if you’ve established a diverse audience and multiple product offerings. You can streamline your workflows and scale your business to save time and earn more.

Our Creator Pro Plan is perfect if you want to maximize the efficiency and effectiveness of your established business. You’ll have the tools to reinvest in you growth and analyze your performance, scaling your business even further.

How many emails can I send with Kit?

There are no sending limits on any of our plans at Kit. You can send as many emails as you want on any of our plans.

What happens when my trial of the Creator or Creator Pro Plan ends?

Your free trial is 14-days for the Creator and Creator Pro Plan—no credit card required to start.

Once your trial is over, you’ll need to add a credit card to continue using your Creator or Creator Pro Plan. You can add in your billing information before your trial is over so your account doesn’t skip a beat.

Don’t need the Creator or Creator Pro Plan just yet? You can also continue with the Newsletter Plan.

What happens when I outgrow my subscriber limit on my plan?

Visualizing your goal is a key to your success. And we will never interrupt your growing business.

When you go over your plan’s limit, we’ll automatically upgrade it to the next subscriber tier. Your account won’t skip a beat. You’ll continue gathering subscribers and sending emails the whole time.

What happens if I clean my list and go under my current subscriber plan?

At this time, our team has to manually downgrade plans. If you plan to delete subscribers, please email [help@kit.com](mailto:help@kit.com) so we can adjust your subscription.

If I don’t like Kit, can I request a refund?

We’d hate to see you go, but we totally understand if Kit is not the right fit for you.

Whether you’re on a monthly or an annual plan, we can give you a refund as long as you’re within the first 30 days of the date you signed up for your account. Our team will cancel your account and send that refund along immediately (but it will take 3-5 days to show up on your credit or debit card account).

If cost is the issue, don’t let that hold you back. Our Newsletter Plan is always available for you for up to 10,000 subscribers—for free.

Is it hard to switch to Kit if I already have an email list somewhere else?

Moving to a new email marketing platform can be daunting. That's why Kit offers a [free migration service](https://kit.com/migrations) for creators with over 5,000 subscribers on our paid plans. Our team handles everything from subscriber lists to automations, so you have a stress-free move.

![Image 1](https://media.kit.com/images/slices/ali-abdal-end-cta-bg.jpg?q=55&blend-color=1e1e1e&blend-mode=normal&blend-alpha=95&sat=-20&fm=webp)

The best move you’ll ever make
------------------------------

With Kit's migration service, every element of your email marketing system is transferred seamlessly. We move your subscriber lists, tags, forms, landing pages, sequence emails, templates, and automations, so nothing you need is left behind.

#### Want to see how it works?

![Image 2: Our demo team](https://media.kit.com/images/slices/cta/demo-team-default.png?fm=webp&q=50)

Introduce yourself to your team at Kit. We’ll give you a personalized tour of Kit based on your needs and walk through different strategies to help you grow your business.

Choose from Kit’s scalable pricing plans. Get powerful email tools, automations, and support at every stage of your creator business. Start free today!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Kit offers a free tier for up to 10,000 subscribers and scalable paid plans with additional features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic plan for building an audience.
features: Create unlimited landing pages and forms

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Plan for creators with diverse audiences and product offerings.
Advanced plan for maximizing business efficiency and growth.

additional_fees.fee_description: Transaction fee for digital products or subscriptions, inclusive of credit card processing fees.
